scenes.action_text: ASTEROID CITY INT. TELEVISION STUDIO. EVENING Black and white. A 1950's-era broadcast soundstage. Cameras on pneumatic pedestals. Microphones on telescoping booms. A team of technicians encircling the studio floor. The lights come up on our host, Brylcreemed in a dark suit and necktie. He addresses the audience: HOST Tonight's program takes us backstage to witness first-hand the creation, start to finish, of a new play
